markdownRemark.html: La Reserva de Sotogrande lies in a beautiful natural setting in the upper part of Sotogrande. The golf course is in a beautiful condition. It has vast consistent greens and is quite difficult but fair. There are great views from the elevated golf course as the fairways sweep up and down gullys and slopes.

frontmatter.title: Club de Golf La Reserva - Sotogrande
frontmatter.description: Club de Golf La Reserva - Sotogrande - La Reserva de Sotogrande lies in a beautiful natural setting in the upper part of Sotogrande. The golf course is in a beautiful condition. It has vast consistent greens and is quite difficult but fair. There are great views from the elevated golf course as the fairways sweep up and down gullys and slopes.
frontmatter.address: Avenida de La Reserva s/n, 1, 11310 San Roque, Spain, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 270.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 270.00 euros
